About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: jglovier / jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at jekyll / jekyll

You’ve made it to the bottom, pal. It’s a good sign, right? Nothing much to see here, I’m afraid. If you enjoyed this, you might want to consider spreading the word or giving me a shout. With that said, I bid you adieu and go back to making things.
